name: Movies on wax
description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

key_work.title: House of Wax
key_work.brief_description: House of Wax was the first colour 3D feature film that incorporated stereo sround. So not only did action spring from the screen, but sound effects were also heard in different sections of the cinema, heightening the drama through the illusion of multi-directional audio.

constellations_primary.name: Movies on wax
constellations_primary.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

constellations_other.name: New ways of seeing
constellations_other.description: The 3D worlds presented through the stereoscopic viewer are part of an ongoing fascination with immersive imagery.

start.title: House of Wax
start.brief_description: House of Wax was the first colour 3D feature film that incorporated stereo sround. So not only did action spring from the screen, but sound effects were also heard in different sections of the cinema, heightening the drama through the illusion of multi-directional audio.

constellations_primary.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

end.title: Mystery of the Wax Museum
end.creator_credit: Michael Curtiz, Hal B. Wallis and Henry Blanke
end.brief_description: Years after sculptor Ivan Igor’s partner burns down his wax museum and his “children”, Igor stars a new museum in New York, but his maimed hands confine him to direct lesser artists. People begin disappearing and Igor takes a sinister interested in his assistant’s fiancé.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

links.description: The 1953 film House of Wax, which was one of the earliest examples of 3D filmmaking, was based on the 1933 film Mystery of the Wax Museum, one of the last films to use two-colour Technicolor.

start.title: House of Wax
start.creator_credit: Jaume Collet-Serra, Joel Silver, Robert Zemeckis, Susan Downey and Village Roadshow Pictures
start.brief_description: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

end.title: Supernatural
end.creator_credit: Kerry Weinrauch and Warner Bros. Television
end.brief_description: When they were boys, Sam and Dean Winchester lost their mother to a mysterious and demonic supernatural force. Now, the Winchester brothers crisscross the country in their ‘67 Chevy Impala, battling every kind of supernatural threat they encounter along the way.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

links.description: The ‘Fallen Idols’ episode of Supernatural revolved around mysterious murders in a town with a wax museum. It starred Paris Hilton and Jared Padalecki, who also appeared together in House of Wax.

start.title: Mystery of the Wax Museum
start.creator_credit: Michael Curtiz, Hal B. Wallis and Henry Blanke
start.brief_description: Years after sculptor Ivan Igor’s partner burns down his wax museum and his “children”, Igor stars a new museum in New York, but his maimed hands confine him to direct lesser artists. People begin disappearing and Igor takes a sinister interested in his assistant’s fiancé.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

end.title: The Wax Mask
end.creator_credit: Sergio Stivaletti, Dario Argento, Fulvio Lucisano and Giuseppe Colombo
end.brief_description: Soon after a wax museum opens in Rome, a young man bets that he will spend the night in the museum. His dead body is found the morning after. More and more people begin disappearing, and more wax figures appear.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

links.description: The production of The Wax Mask was directly influenced by earlier wax museum horror films. Writer Dario Argento screened copies of Mystery of the Wax Museum (1993) and House Of Wax (1953) during production.

end.title: House of Wax
end.creator_credit: Jaume Collet-Serra, Joel Silver, Robert Zemeckis, Susan Downey and Village Roadshow Pictures
end.brief_description: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

links.description: In 2005 House of Wax was released, a loose remake of the 1953 classic. It was filmed at Movie World in Queensland and starred Paris Hilton and Jared Padalecki.
